TopicTitle: Color or otherwise change the Engineer Report icon as an indicator

Articles.Content: In 0.90, the "info" icon would change colors if I was breaching a size, part count, or mass limit. Similarly, I think that it would be handy if the new report icon would change colors (and/or add an exclamation point or something) when a warning or flaw is detected.

I would like some sort of "expanded" button to pop out; when you have issues. Functionally like the popout "abort" button at the top of the screen.

This would show up to 3 "buttons" that would show the issues in the engineer report. Clicking any would expand the engineer report to a large enough size to see all issues.

i.e.

(informationicon) with "x3"

(warningicon) "x1"

(criticalicon) <hidden> (no critical issues found)</hidden>
